bill.title: Relating to the financial administration of the State Parks and Recreation Department; declaring an emergency.
bill.description: Appropriates moneys from General Fund to State Parks and Recreation Department for certain biennial expenses. Appropriates moneys from General Fund to State Parks and Recreation Department for certain biennial expenses. Limits certain biennial expenditures from fees, moneys or other revenues, including Miscellaneous Receipts, but excluding lottery funds and federal funds, collected or received by department. Limits biennial expenditures by department from lottery moneys for certain purposes. Limits biennial expenditures by department from federal funds for certain purposes. Declares emergency, effective July 1, 2023.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Assigned to Subcommittee On Natural Resources.
